<P class="p553 ft8">Liquidity</P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The Commission shall be empowered to adopt a delegated act in accordance with Article 445 to specify in detail the general requirement set out in Article 401. Such specification shall be based on the items to be reported according to Part Six, Title II. The delegated act shall also specify under which circumstances competent authorities have to impose specific in- and outflow levels on credit institutions in order to capture specific risks to which they are exposed.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p475 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The Commission shall be empowered to modify the items referred to in paragraph 1 or add additional items only if one of the following conditions is met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">a liquidity coverage requirement based on those criteria, considered either individually or cumulatively, would have a material detrimental impact on the business and risk profile of European institutions or on financial markets or the economy; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft13">modification is appropriate to align them with internationally agreed standards for liquidity supervision.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p19 ft1">For the purposes of point (a), in assessing the impact of a liquidity coverage requirement based on those criteria, the Commission shall take into account the reports referred to in paragraphs 1 and 2 of Article 481.</P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The Commission shall adopt the first delegated act referred to in paragraph 1 at the latest by 31 December 2015. A delegated act adopted in accordance with this Article shall, however, not apply before 1 January 2015.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p554 ft1">122</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_124">


<P class="p26 ft8">Article 445</P>
<P class="p474 ft8">Exercise of the delegation</P>
<P class="p28 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The power to adopt delegated acts is conferred on the Commission subject to the conditions laid down in this Article.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p29 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The delegation of powers referred to in Articles 441 to 444 shall be conferred for an indeterminate period of time from the date referred to in Article 488.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The delegation of power referred to in Articles 441 to 444 may be revoked at any time by the European Parliament or by the Council. A decision of revocation shall put an end to the delegation of the power specified in that decision. It shall take effect the day following the publication of the decision in the Official Journal of the European Union or at a later date specified therein. It shall not affect the validity of the delegated acts already in force.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p486 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">As soon as it adopts a delegated act, the Commission shall notify it simultaneously to the European Parliament and to the Council.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">A delegated act adopted pursuant to Articles 441 to 444 shall enter into force only if no objection has been expressed by the European Parliament or the Council within a period of 2 months of notification of that act to the European Parliament and the Council or if, before the expiry of that period, the European Parliament and the Council have both informed the Commission that they will not object. That period shall be extended by 2 moths at the initiative of the European Parliament or the Council.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p220 ft8">Article 446</P>
<P class="p226 ft8">Urgency procedure</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Delegated acts adopted under this Article shall enter into force without delay and shall apply as long as no objection is expressed in accordance with paragraph 2. The notification of a delegated act to the European Parliament and to the Council shall state the reasons for the use of the urgency procedure.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Either the European Parliament or the Council may object to a delegated act in accordance with the procedure referred to in Article 445(5). In such a case, the Commission shall repeal the act without delay following the notification of the decision to object by the European Parliament or the Council.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p105 ft8">Article 447</P>
<P class="p555 ft8">European Banking Committee</P>
<P class="p29 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For the adoption of implementing acts, the Commission shall be assisted by the European Banking Committee established by Commission Decision 2004/10/EC. That committee shall be a committee within the meaning of Article 3(2) of Regulation (EU) No 182/2011.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Where reference is made to this paragraph, Article 5 of Regulation (EU) No. 182/2011 shall apply.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p556 ft1">123</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_125">


<P class="p557 ft6">PART TEN</P>
<P class="p558 ft6">TRANSITIONAL PROVISIONS, REPORTS AND REVIEWS</P>
<P class="p446 ft6">Title I</P>
<P class="p559 ft6">Transitional provisions</P>
<P class="p12 ft7">Chapter 1</P>
<P class="p560 ft142">Own funds requirements, unrealised gains and losses measured at fair value and deductions</P>
<P class="p561 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>ECTION <SPAN class="ft32">1</SPAN></P>
<P class="p146 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">O</SPAN>WN FUNDS REQUIREMENTS</P>
<P class="p31 ft8">Article 448</P>
<P class="p519 ft8">Own funds requirements</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from points (a) and (b) of Article 87(1), institutions shall satisfy the following own funds requirements:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">at all times during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p287 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft14">a Common Equity Tier 1 capital ratio of a level that falls within a range with a lowest value of 3.5% and a highest value of 4.5%;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p287 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(ii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">a Tier 1 capital ratio of a level that falls within a range with a lowest value of 4.5 % and a highest value of 6%;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">at all times during the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p287 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft14">a Common Equity Tier 1 capital ratio of a level that falls within a range of 4 % to 4.5 %;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p493 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(ii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">a Tier 1 capital ratio of a level that falls within a range of 4.5 % to 6%.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the levels of the Common Equity Tier 1 and Tier 1 capital ratios in the ranges specified in points (a) and (b) of paragraph 1 that institutions shall satisfy;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p191 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p562 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>ECTION <SPAN class="ft32">2</SPAN></P>
<P class="p563 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">U</SPAN>NREALISED GAINS AND LOSSES MEASURED AT FAIR VALUE</P>
<P class="p549 ft1">124</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_126">


<P class="p26 ft8">Article 449</P>
<P class="p515 ft8">Unrealised losses measured at fair value</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 32, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017 institutions shall include in the calculation of their Common Equity Tier 1 items only the applicable percentage of unrealised losses measured at fair value, excluding those referred to in Article 30.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p213 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The applicable percentage for the purposes of paragraph 1 shall fall within following ranges:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 100 % during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">20 % to 100 % during the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">40 % to 100 % during the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">60 % to 100 % during the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">80 % to 100 % for the period from1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the applicable percentage in the ranges specified in points (a) to (e) of paragraph 2;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p244 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p161 ft8">Article 450</P>
<P class="p564 ft8">Unrealised gains measured at fair value</P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 32, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, institutions shall not remove from their Common Equity Tier 1 items the applicable percentage of unrealised gains measured at fair value, excluding those referred to in Article</SPAN></P>
<P class="p411 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">30.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft89">The resulting residual amount shall be removed from Common Equity Tier 1 items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p38 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For the purposes of paragraph 1, the applicable percentage shall be 0 % during the period from</SPAN></P>
<P class="p148 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1</SPAN><SPAN class="ft143">January 2013 to 31 December 2013, and shall, after that date, fall within the following ranges:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p244 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 20 % during the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 40 % during the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 60 % during the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 80 % for the period from 1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 59, institutions shall include the applicable percentage of the residual amount removed from Common Equity Tier 1 capital in accordance with paragraph 1 in Tier 2 items, to the extent that those unrealised gains measured at fair value</SPAN></P>
<P class="p549 ft1">125</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_127">


<P class="p231 ft1">would have been recognised as additional own funds according to national transposition for Directive 2006/48/EC. The applicable percentage shall fall within the following ranges:</P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">100 % during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">80 % during the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">60 % during the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">40 % during the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">20 % during the period from 1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p191 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the applicable percentage of unrealised gains in the ranges specified in points</SPAN></P>
<P class="p565 ft1">(a) to (d) of paragraph 2 that is not removed from Common Equity Tier 1 capital;</P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p214 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>ECTION <SPAN class="ft32">3</SPAN></P>
<P class="p566 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">D</SPAN>EDUCTIONS</P>
<P class="p567 ft33"><NOBR><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>UB<SPAN class="ft32">-</SPAN>SECTION</NOBR> <SPAN class="ft32">1</SPAN></P>
<P class="p568 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">D</SPAN>EDUCTIONS FROM <SPAN class="ft32">C</SPAN>OMMON <SPAN class="ft32">E</SPAN>QUITY <SPAN class="ft32">T</SPAN>IER <SPAN class="ft32">1 </SPAN>ITEMS</P>
<P class="p161 ft8">Article 451</P>
<P class="p569 ft8">Deductions from Common Equity Tier 1 items</P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 33(1), during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, the following shall apply:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">institutions shall deduct from Common Equity Tier 1 items the applicable percentage specified in Article 458 of the amounts required to be deducted pursuant to points (a) to</SPAN></P>
<P class="p570 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(h)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft132">of Article 33(1), excluding deferred tax assets that rely on future profitability and arise from temporary differences;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">institutions shall apply the relevant provisions laid down in Article 453 to the residual amounts of items required to be deducted pursuant to points (a) to (h) of Article 33(1), excluding deferred tax assets that rely on future profitability and arise from temporary differences;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p109 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">institutions shall deduct from Common Equity Tier 1 items the applicable percentage specified in Article 458 of the total amount required to be deducted pursuant to points</SPAN></P>
<P class="p571 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft89">and (i) of Article 33(1) after applying Article 452;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">institutions shall apply the requirements laid down in Article 453(4) or Article 453(10), as applicable, to the total residual amount of items required to be deducted pursuant to points (c) and (i) of Article 33(1) after applying Article 452.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p572 ft1">126</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_128">


<P class="p193 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall determine the portion of the total residual amount referred to point (d) of paragraph 1, that is subject to Article 453(4), by dividing the amount specified in point (a) by the amount specified in point (b):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p40 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">the amount of deferred tax assets that are dependent on future profitability and arise from temporary differences referred to in point (a) of Article 452(2);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p30 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the sum of the amounts referred to in points (a) and (b) of Article 452(2).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall determine the portion of the total residual amount referred to point (d) of paragraph 1 that is subject to Article 453(10) by dividing the amount specified in point (a) by the amount specified in point (b):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the amount of direct and indirect holdings of the Common Equity Tier 1 instruments referred to in point (b) of Article 452(2);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the sum of the amounts referred to in points (a) and (b) of Article 452(2).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p573 ft8">Article 452</P>
<P class="p574 ft8">Exemption from deduction from Common Equity Tier 1 items</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For the purposes of this Article, relevant Common Equity Tier 1 items shall comprise the Common Equity Tier 1 items of the institution calculated after applying the provisions of Article 3 and making the deductions pursuant to points (a) to (h) and (j), (k) and (l) of Article 33(1), excluding deferred tax assets that rely on future profitability and arise from temporary differences.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p149 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 45(1), during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, institutions shall not deduct the items listed in points (a) and (b) which in aggregate are equal to or less than 15 % of relevant Common Equity Tier 1 items of the institution:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p109 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">deferred tax assets that are dependent on future profitability and arise from temporary differences and in aggregate are equal to or less than 10 % of relevant Common Equity Tier 1 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">where an institution has a significant investment in a relevant entity, the direct and indirect holdings by the institution of the Common Equity Tier 1 instruments of that entity that in aggregate are equal to or less than 10 % of relevant Common Equity Tier 1 items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p114 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 45(2), the items exempt from deduction pursuant to paragraph 2 shall be risk weighted at 250 %. The items referred to in point (b) of paragraph 2 shall be subject to the requirements of Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p575 ft1">127</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_129">


<P class="p517 ft8">Article 453</P>
<P class="p0 ft8">Items not deducted from Common Equity Tier 1</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from points (a) to (i) Article 33(1), during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, institutions shall apply this Article to the residual amounts of items referred to in points (b) and (d) of Article 451(1):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p218 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of losses of the current financial year referred to in point (a) of Article 33(1):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">losses that are material are deducted from Tier 1 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">losses that are not material are not deducted.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall deduct the residual amount of the intangible assets referred to in point (b) of Article 33(1)(b) from Tier 1 items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The residual amount of the deferred tax assets referred to in point (c) of Article 33(1) shall not be deducted and shall be subject to a risk weight of 0 %.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">The residual amount of the items referred to in point (d) of Article 33(1) shall be deducted half from Tier 1 items and half from Tier 2 items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The residual amount of the assets of a defined benefit pension fund referred to in point (e) of Article 33(1) shall not be deducted from any element of own funds and shall be included in Common Equity Tier 1 items to the extent that amount would have been recognised as original own funds according to the national transposition measures for points (a) to (ca) of Article 57 of Directive 2006/48/EC.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p149 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">7.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of holdings of own Common Equity Tier 1 instruments referred to in point (f) of Article 33(1):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the amount of direct holdings is deducted from Tier 1 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the amount of indirect holdings, including own Common Equity Tier 1 instruments that an institution could be obliged to purchase by virtue of an existing or contingent contractual obligation is not deducted and is subject to a risk weight in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and to the requirements laid down in Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p149 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">8.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of holdings of Common Equity Tier 1 instruments of a relevant entity where the institution has reciprocal cross holdings with that entity referred to in point (g) of Article 33(1):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">where an institution does not have a significant investment in that relevant entity, the amount of its holding of the Common Equity Tier 1 instruments of that entity is treated as falling under point (h) of Article 33(1);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">where an institution has a significant investment in that relevant entity, the amount of its holdings of Common Equity Tier 1 instruments of that entity is treated as falling under point (i) of Article 33(1).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p576 ft1">128</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_130">


<P class="p577 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">9.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amounts of items referred to in point (h) of Article 33(1):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the amounts required to be deducted that relate to direct holdings are deducted half from Tier 1 items and half from Tier 2 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the amounts that relate to indirect holdings are not deducted and are subject to a risk weights in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and to the requirements laid down in Title IV of Part Three, as applicable;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p113 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">10.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft35">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amounts of the items referred to in point</SPAN></P>
<P class="p411 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft89">of Article 33(1):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the amounts required to be deducted that relate to direct holdings are deducted half from Tier 1 items and half from Tier 2 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the amounts that relate to indirect holdings are not deducted and are subject to risk weights in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and to the requirements laid down in Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p578 ft33"><NOBR><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>UB<SPAN class="ft32">-</SPAN>SECTION</NOBR> <SPAN class="ft32">2</SPAN></P>
<P class="p579 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">D</SPAN>EDUCTIONS FROM <SPAN class="ft32">A</SPAN>DDITIONAL <SPAN class="ft32">T</SPAN>IER <SPAN class="ft32">1 </SPAN>ITEMS</P>
<P class="p105 ft8">Article 454</P>
<P class="p564 ft8">Deductions from Additional Tier 1 items</P>
<P class="p520 ft4">By way of derogation from Article 53, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, the following shall apply:</P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft59">institutions shall deduct from Additional Tier 1 items the applicable percentage specified in Article 458 of the amounts required to be deducted pursuant to Article 53;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p29 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft31">institutions shall apply the requirements laid down in Article 455 to the residual amounts of the items required to be deducted pursuant to Article 53.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p31 ft8">Article 455</P>
<P class="p0 ft8">Items not deducted from Additional Tier 1 items</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 53, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, the requirements laid down in this Article shall apply to the residual amounts referred to in point (b) of Article 454.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to residual amount of the items referred to in point (a) of Article 53:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p97 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">direct holdings of own Additional Tier 1 instruments that are shares are deducted at book value from Tier 1 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p580 ft1">129</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_131">


<P class="p37 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">direct holdings of own Additional Tier 1 instruments that are not shares are not deducted and are risk weighted in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and subject to the requirements of Title IV of Part Three, as applicable;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">indirect holdings of own Additional Tier 1 instruments, including own Additional Tier 1 instruments that an institution could be obliged to purchase by virtue of an existing or contingent contractual obligation, are not deducted and are risk weighted in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and subject to the requirements of Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p281 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of the items referred to in point</SPAN></P>
<P class="p581 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft89">of Article 53:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">where an institution does not have a significant investment in a relevant entity with which it has reciprocal cross holdings, the amount of its direct and indirect holdings of those Additional Tier 1 instruments of that entity is treated as falling within point (c) of Article 53;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p34 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">where the institution has a significant investment in a relevant entity with which it has reciprocal cross holdings, the amount of its direct and indirect holdings of those Additional Tier 1 instruments of that entity is treated as falling within point (d) of Article 53.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p473 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of the items referred to in points</SPAN></P>
<P class="p581 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft89">and (d) of Article 53:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p191 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the amount relating to direct holdings required to be deducted in accordance with points</SPAN></P>
<P class="p565 ft1">(c) and (d) of Article 53 are deducted half from Tier 1 items and half from Tier 2 items;</P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the amount relating to indirect holdings required to be deducted in accordance with points (c) and (d) of Article 53 shall not be deducted and shall be subject to a risk weight in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and to the requirements of Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p582 ft33"><NOBR><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>UB<SPAN class="ft32">-</SPAN>SECTION</NOBR> <SPAN class="ft32">3</SPAN></P>
<P class="p583 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">D</SPAN>EDUCTIONS FROM <SPAN class="ft32">T</SPAN>IER <SPAN class="ft32">2 </SPAN>ITEMS</P>
<P class="p105 ft8">Article 456</P>
<P class="p584 ft8">Deductions from Tier 2 items</P>
<P class="p29 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 63, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, the following shall apply:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">institutions shall deduct from Tier 2 items the applicable percentage specified in Article 458 of the amounts required to be deducted pursuant to Article 63;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">Institutions shall apply the requirements laid down in Article 457 to the residual amounts required to be deducted pursuant to Article 63.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p585 ft1">130</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_132">


<P class="p26 ft8">Article 457</P>
<P class="p584 ft8">Deductions from Tier 2 items</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 63, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, the requirements laid down in this Article shall apply to the residual amounts referred to in point (b) of Article 456.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of items referred to in point (a) of Article 63:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p97 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">direct holdings of own Tier 2 instruments that are shares are deducted at book value from Tier 2 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">direct holdings of own Tier 2 instruments that are not shares are not deducted and are risk weighted in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and subject to the requirements of Title IV of Part Three, as applicable;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">indirect holdings of own Tier 2 instruments, including own Tier 2 instruments that an institution could be obliged to purchase by virtue of an existing or contingent contractual obligation are not deducted and are risk weighted in accordance with Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and subject to the requirements of Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p473 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of the items referred to in point</SPAN></P>
<P class="p411 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft89">of Article 63:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">where an institution does not have a significant investment in a relevant entity with which it has reciprocal cross holdings, the amount of its direct and indirect holdings of the Tier 2 instruments of that entity is treated as falling within point (c) of Article 63;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">where the institution has a significant investment in a relevant entity with which it has reciprocal cross holdings, the amount of direct and indirect holdings of the Tier 2 instruments of that relevant entity are treated as falling within point (d) of Article 63.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p113 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply the following to the residual amount of the items referred to in points</SPAN></P>
<P class="p411 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft89">and (d) of Article 63:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the amount relating to direct holdings that is required to be deducted in accordance with points (c) and (d) of Article 63 is deducted half from Tier 1 items and half from Tier 2 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p34 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the amount relating to indirect holdings that is required to be deducted in accordance with points (c) and (d) of Article 63 is not be deducted and are subject to a risk weight under Chapter 2 or 3 of Title II of Part Three and the requirements laid down in Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p586 ft1">131</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_133">


<P class="p537 ft33"><NOBR><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>UB<SPAN class="ft32">-</SPAN>SECTION</NOBR> <SPAN class="ft32">4</SPAN></P>
<P class="p587 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">A</SPAN>PPLICABLE PERCENTAGES FOR DEDUCTION</P>
<P class="p141 ft8">Article 458</P>
<P class="p588 ft8">Applicable percentages for deduction from Common Equity Tier 1, Additional Tier 1 and Tier 2 items</P>
<P class="p28 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The applicable percentage for the purposes of points (a) and (c) of Article 451(1), point (a) of Article 454 and point (a) of Article 456shall fall within the following ranges:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 100 % for the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">20 % to 100 % for the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">40 % to 100 % for the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">60 % to 100 % for the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">80 % to 100 % for the period from 1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p432 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the applicable percentage in the ranges specified in paragraph 1 for each of the following:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p287 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft14">the items referred to in points (a) to (h) of Article 33(1), excluding deferred tax assets that rely on future profitability and arise from temporary differences;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p190 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(ii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">deferred tax assets that rely on future profitability and arise from temporary differences and the items referred to in point (i) of Article 33(1);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p490 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(iii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">the items referred to in points (a) to (d) of Article 53;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p59 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(iv)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft55">the items referred to in points (a) to (d) of Article 63;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p589 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>ECTION <SPAN class="ft32">4</SPAN></P>
<P class="p590 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">M</SPAN>INORITY INTEREST AND <SPAN class="ft32">A</SPAN>DDITIONAL <SPAN class="ft32">T</SPAN>IER <SPAN class="ft32">1 </SPAN>AND <SPAN class="ft32">T</SPAN>IER <SPAN class="ft32">2 </SPAN>INSTRUMENTS</P>
<P class="p591 ft33">ISSUED BY SUBSIDIARIES</P>
<P class="p44 ft8">Article 459</P>
<P class="p592 ft111">Recognition in consolidated Common Equity Tier 1 capital of instruments and items that do not qualify as minority interests</P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Title III of Part Two, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, recognition in consolidated own funds of the of items that would qualify as consolidated reserves in accordance with national transposition measures pursuant to Article</SPAN></P>
<P class="p593 ft1">132</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_134">


<P class="p148 ft1">65 of Directive 2006/48/EC that do not qualify as consolidated Common Equity Tier 1 capital for any of the following reasons shall be determined by the competent authorities in accordance with paragraphs 2 and 3:</P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the instrument does not qualify as a Common Equity Tier 1 instrument, and the related retained earnings and share premium accounts consequently do not qualify as consolidated Common Equity Tier 1 items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">as a result of paragraph 2 of Article 76;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">because the subsidiary is not an institution or an entity that is subject by virtue of applicable national law to the requirements of this Regulation and Directive [inserted by OP];</SPAN></P>
<P class="p34 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">because the subsidiary is not included fully in the consolidation pursuant to Chapter 2 of Title II of Part One.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The applicable percentage of the items referred to in paragraph 1 that would have qualified as consolidated reserves in accordance with the national transposition measures for Article 65 of Directive 2006/48/EC shall qualify as consolidated Common Equity Tier 1 capital.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For the purposes of paragraph 2, the applicable percentages shall fall within the following ranges:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p244 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 100 % for the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 80 % for the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 60 % for the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 40 % for the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 20% for the period from 1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the applicable percentage in the ranges specified in paragraph 3;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p573 ft8">Article 460</P>
<P class="p594 ft111">Recognition of in consolidated own funds of minority interests and qualifying Additional Tier1 and Tier 2 capital</P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from point (b) of Article 79, point (b) of Article 80 and point (b) of Article 82, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, the percentages referred to in those points shall be multiplied by an applicable factor.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p38 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For the purposes of paragraph 1, the applicable factor shall fall within the following ranges:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 to 1 in the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p508 ft1">133</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_135">


<P class="p411 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0.2 to 1 in the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0.4 to 1 in the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0.6 to 1 in the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft30">0.8 to 1 in the period from 1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p432 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the value of the applicable factor in the ranges specified in paragraph 2;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p589 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>ECTION <SPAN class="ft32">5</SPAN></P>
<P class="p595 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">A</SPAN>DDITIONAL FILTERS AND DEDUCTIONS</P>
<P class="p105 ft8">Article 461</P>
<P class="p499 ft8">Additional filters and deductions</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Articles 29 to 33, 53 and 63, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, institutions shall make adjustments to include in or deduct from Common Equity Tier 1 items, Tier 1 items, Tier 2 items or own funds items the applicable percentage of filters or deductions required under national transposition measures for Articles 57 and 66 of Directive 2006/48/EC, and for Articles 13 and 16 of Directive 2006/49/EC, and which are not required in accordance with Part Two.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p144 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For the purposes of paragraph 1, the applicable percentage shall fall within the following ranges:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p244 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 100 % for the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 80 % for the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 60 % for the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 40 % for the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 20 % for the period from 1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p432 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For each filter or deduction referred to in paragraph 1, competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the applicable percentages in the ranges specified in paragraph 2;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">EBA shall develop draft regulatory technical standards to specify the conditions according to which competent authorities shall determine whether adjustments made to own funds, or elements thereof, in accordance with national transposition measures for Directive 2006/48/EC or Directive 2006/49/EC that are not included in Part Two should for the purposes</SPAN></P>
<P class="p554 ft1">134</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_136">


<P class="p148 ft1">of this Article be made to Common Equity Tier 1 items, Additional Tier 1 items, Tier 1 items, Tier 2 items or own funds.</P>
<P class="p24 ft1">EBA shall submit those draft regulatory technical standards to the Commission by 1 January 2013.</P>
<P class="p153 ft1">Power is delegated to the Commission to adopt the regulatory technical standards referred to in the first <NOBR>sub-paragraph</NOBR> in accordance with the procedures laid down in Articles 10 to 14 of Regulation (EU) No 1093/2010.</P>
<P class="p596 ft7">Chapter 2</P>
<P class="p597 ft7">Grandfathering of capital instruments</P>
<P class="p598 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>ECTION <SPAN class="ft32">1</SPAN></P>
<P class="p469 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">I</SPAN>NSTRUMENTS CONSTITUTING <SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>TATE AID</P>
<P class="p141 ft8">Article 462</P>
<P class="p599 ft8">Grandfathering of State aid instruments</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Articles 24 to 27, 48, 49, 59 and 60 during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, this Article applies to capital instruments where the following conditions are met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p191 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the instruments were issued prior to 20 July 2011;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the instruments constitute State aid;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the instruments were considered compatible with the internal market by the Commission under Article 107 TFEU.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Instruments that qualified in accordance with the national transposition measures for point (a) of Article 57 of Directive 2006/48/EC shall qualify as Common Equity Tier 1 instruments notwithstanding either of the following:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p191 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 26 are not met;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p97 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the instruments were issued by an undertaking referred to in Article 25 and the conditions laid down in Articles 26, or Article 27 as applicable, are not met.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Instruments that qualified in accordance with the national transposition measures for point (ca) of Article 57 and for Article 66(1) of Directive 2006/48/EC shall qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments notwithstanding the conditions laid down in Article 49(1) not being met.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Items that qualified in accordance with national transposition measures for points (f), (g) or (h) of Article 57 and for Article 66(1) of Directive 2006/48/EC shall qualify as Tier 2 instruments notwithstanding the items not being referred to in Article 59 or the conditions laid down in Article 60 not being met.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p600 ft1">135</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_137">


<P class="p601 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>ECTION <SPAN class="ft32">2</SPAN></P>
<P class="p602 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">I</SPAN>NSTRUMENTS NOT CONSTITUTING <SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>TATE AID</P>
<P class="p603 ft33"><NOBR><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>UB<SPAN class="ft32">-</SPAN>SECTION</NOBR> <SPAN class="ft32">1</SPAN></P>
<P class="p485 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">G</SPAN>RANDFATHERING ELIGIBILITY AND LIMITS</P>
<P class="p141 ft8">Article 463</P>
<P class="p604 ft111">Eligibility for grandfathering of items that qualified as own funds under national transposition measures for Directive 2006/48/EC</P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">This Article shall apply only to instruments that were issued prior to 20 July 2011 and are not those referred to in Article 462(1).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Articles 24 to 27, 48, 49, 59 and 60 , this Article shall apply during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Subject to the limit specified in Article 464(2), capital within the meaning of Article 22 of Directive 86/365/EC, and the related share premium accounts, that qualified as original own funds under the national transposition measures for point (a) of Article 57 of Directive 2006/48/EC shall qualify as Common Equity Tier 1 items notwithstanding that capital not meeting the conditions laid down in Articles 262, or Article 27 as applicable.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Subject to the limit specified Article 464(3), instruments, and the related share premium accounts, that qualified as original own funds under national transposition measures for point (ca) of Article 57 and Article 154(8) and (9) of Directive 2006/48/shall qualify as Additional Tier 1 items, notwithstanding the conditions laid down in Article 49 not being met.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Subject to the limits specified in Article 464(4), items, and the related share premium accounts, that qualified under national transposition measures for points (f), (g) or (h) of Article 57 of Directive 2006/48/EC shall qualify as Tier 2 items, notwithstanding those items not being included in Article 59 or the conditions laid down in Article 60 not being met.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p605 ft8">Article 464</P>
<P class="p606 ft111">Limits for grandfathering of items within Common Equity Tier 1, Additional Tier 1 and Tier 2 items</P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">During the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021, the extent to which instruments referred to in Article 463 shall qualify as own funds shall be limited in accordance with this Article.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p114 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The amount of items referred to Article 463(3) that shall qualify as Common Equity Tier 1 items is limited to the applicable percentage of the sum of the amounts specified in points (a) and (b):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the nominal amount of capital referred to in Article 463(3) that were in issue on 31 December 2012;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p527 ft1">136</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_138">


<P class="p411 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the share premium accounts related to the items referred to in point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The amount of items referred to Article 463(4) that shall qualify as Additional Tier 1 items is limited to the applicable percentage multiplied by the result of subtracting from the sum of the amounts specified in points (a) and (b) the sum of the amounts specified in points (c) to (f):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p40 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the nominal amount of instruments referred to in Article 463(4), that remained in issue on 31 December 2012;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the share premium accounts related to the instruments referred to in point (a);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the amount of instruments referred to in Article 463(4) which on 31 December 2012 which exceeded the limits specified in the national transposition measures for point (a) of Article 66(1) and Article 66(1a) of Directive 2006/48/EC;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p191 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the share premium accounts related to the instruments referred to in point (c);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the nominal amount of instruments referred to Article 463(4) that were in issue on 31 December 2012 but do not qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments pursuant to Article 467(4);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p158 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft30">the share premium accounts related to the instruments referred to in point (e).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The amount of items referred to Article 463(5) that shall qualify as Tier 2 items is limited to the applicable percentage of the result of subtracting from the sum of the amounts specified in points (a) to (d) the sum of amounts specified in points (e) to (h):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">the nominal amount of instruments referred to in Article 463(5) that remained in issue on 31 December 2012;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p30 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the share premium accounts related to the instruments referred to in point (a);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the nominal amount of subordinated loan capital that remained in issue on 31 December, reduced by the amount required pursuant to national transposition measures for point (c) of Article 64(3) of Directive 2006/48/EC;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the nominal amount of items referred to in Article 463(5), other than the instruments and subordinated loan capital referred to in points (a) and (c) of this paragraph, that were in issue on 31 December 2012;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the nominal amount of instruments and items referred to in Article 463(5) that were in issue on 31 December 2012 that exceeded the limits specified in the national transposition measures for point (a) of Article 66(1) of Directive 2006/48/EEC ;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p191 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft30">the share premium accounts related to the instruments referred to in point (e);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(g)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft13">the nominal amount of instruments referred to in Article 463(5) that were in issue on 31 December 2012 that do not qualify as Tier 2 items pursuant to Article 468(4);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p30 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(h)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the share premium accounts related to the instruments referred to in point (g).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p538 ft1">137</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_139">


<P class="p577 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">For the purposes of this Article, the applicable percentages referred to in paragraphs 2 to 4 shall fall within the following ranges:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 90 % during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 80 % during the period from 1 January 2014 to 31 December 2014;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 70 % during the period from 1 January 2015 to 31 December 2015;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 60 % during the period from 1 January 2016 to 31 December 2016;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">0 % to 50 % during the period from 1 January 2017 to 31 December 2017;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft30">0 % to 40 % during the period from 1 January 2018 to 31 December 2018;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(g)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 30 % during the period from 1 January 2019 to 31 December 2019;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(h)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">0 % to 20 % during the period from 1 January 2020 to 31 December 2020;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft30">0 % to 10 % during the period from 1 January 2021 to 31 December 2021.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p432 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Competent authorities shall:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">determine the applicable percentages in the ranges specified in paragraph 5;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">publish the determination made in accordance with point (a).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p607 ft8">Article 465</P>
<P class="p608 ft8">Items excluded from grandfathering in Common Equity Tier 1 or Additional Tier 1 items in other elements of own funds</P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Articles 48, 49, 59 and 60 , during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021, institutions may treat as items referred to in Article 463(4), capital, and the related share premium accounts, referred to in Article 463(3) that are excluded from Common Equity Tier 1 items because they exceed the applicable percentage specified in Article 464(2), to the extent that the inclusion of that capital and the related share premium accounts, does not exceed the applicable percentage limit referred to in Article 464(3).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p144 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Articles 48, 49, 59 and 60 , during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021, institutions may treat the following as items referred to in Article 463(5), to the extent that their inclusion does not exceed the applicable percentage limit referred to in Article 464(4):</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">capital, and the related share premium accounts, referred to in Article 463(3) that are excluded from Common Equity Tier 1 items because they exceed the applicable percentage specified in Article 464(2);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">instruments, and the related share premium accounts, referred to in Article 463(4) that exceed the applicable percentage referred to in Article 464(3).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p609 ft1">138</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_140">


<P class="p193 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">EBA shall develop draft regulatory technical standards to specify the conditions for treating own funds instruments referred to in paragraphs 1 and 2 as falling under Article 464(4) or 464(5) during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p17 ft1">EBA shall submit those draft regulatory technical standards to the Commission by 1 January 2013.</P>
<P class="p153 ft1">Power is delegated to the Commission to adopt the regulatory technical standards referred to in the first <NOBR>sub-paragraph</NOBR> in accordance with the procedure laid down in Articles 10 to 14 of Regulation (EU) No 1093/2010.</P>
<P class="p573 ft8">Article 466</P>
<P class="p610 ft8">Amortisation of items grandfathered as Tier 2 items</P>
<P class="p520 ft1">The items referred to Article 463(5) that qualify as Tier 2 items pursuant to Article 463(5) or Article 464(2) shall be subject to the requirements laid down in Article 61.</P>
<P class="p611 ft33"><NOBR><SPAN class="ft32">S</SPAN>UB<SPAN class="ft32">-</SPAN>SECTION</NOBR> <SPAN class="ft32">2</SPAN></P>
<P class="p612 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">I</SPAN>NCLUSION OF INSTRUMENTS WITH A CALL AND INCENTIVE TO REDEEM IN</P>
<P class="p613 ft33"><SPAN class="ft32">A</SPAN>DDITIONAL <SPAN class="ft32">T</SPAN>IER <SPAN class="ft32">1 </SPAN>AND <SPAN class="ft32">T</SPAN>IER <SPAN class="ft32">2 </SPAN>ITEMS</P>
<P class="p105 ft8">Article 467</P>
<P class="p614 ft8">Hybrid instruments with a call and incentive to redeem</P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Article 48 and 49, during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021, instruments referred to in Article 463(4) that qualified under the national transposition measures for Article 57(ca) of Directive 2006/48/EC and include in their terms and conditions a call with an incentive for them to be redeemed by the institution shall be subject to the requirements laid down in paragraphs 2 to 7.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p486 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The instruments shall qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments provided the following conditions are met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem only prior to 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 49 are met from 1 January 2013.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The instruments shall qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments in accordance with Article 463(4) between 1 January 2013 and the date of their effective maturity and thereafter qualify as Additional Tier 1 items without limit provided:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem only on or after 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p516 ft1">139</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_141">


<P class="p37 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of the effective maturity of the instruments;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 49 are met from the date of the effective maturity of the instruments.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The instruments shall not qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments, and shall not be subject to Article 463(4), from 1 January 2013 where the following conditions are met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p97 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem between 20 July 2011 and 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of the effective maturity of the instruments;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 49 are not met from the date of the effective maturity of the instruments.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The instruments shall qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments in accordance with Article 463(4) between 1 January 2013 and the date of their effective maturity, and shall not qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments thereafter, where the following conditions are met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem on or after 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of the effective maturity of the instruments;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 49 are not met from the date of the effective maturity of the instruments.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The instruments shall qualify as Additional Tier 1 instruments in accordance with Article 463(4) where the following conditions are met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem only prior to or on 20 July 2011;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p22 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of the effective maturity of the instruments;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 49 were not met from the date of the effective maturity of the instruments.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p95 ft8">Article 468</P>
<P class="p615 ft8">Tier 2 items with an incentive to redeem</P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Articles 59 and 60 , during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021, items referred to in Article 463(5) that qualified under the national transposition measures for points (f), (g) or (h) of Article 57 of Directive 2006/48/EC and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p525 ft1">140</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_142">


<P class="p231 ft1">include in their terms and conditions a call with an incentive for them to be redeemed by the institution shall be subject to the requirements laid down in paragraphs 2 to 7.</P>
<P class="p107 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The items shall qualify as Tier 2 instruments provided:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem only prior to 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p30 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">from 1 January 2013 the conditions laid down in Article 60 are met.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p29 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The items shall qualify as Tier 2 items in accordance with Article 463(5) between 1 January 2013 and the date of their effective maturity, and shall qualify thereafter as Tier 2 items without limit, provided the following conditions are met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem only on or after 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of the effective maturity of the items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">the conditions laid down in Article 60 are met from the date of the effective maturity of the items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The items shall not qualify as Tier 2 items from 1 January 2013 where the following conditions are met:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem only between 20 July 2011 and 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of the effective maturity of the items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 60 are not met from the date of the effective maturity of the items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p29 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The items shall qualify as Tier 2 items in accordance with Article 463(5) between 1 January 2013 and the date of their effective maturity, and shall not qualify as Tier 2 items thereafter, where:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p34 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem on or after 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p94 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of their effective maturity;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions set out in Article 60 are not met from the date of effective maturity of the items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p243 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The items shall qualify as Tier 2 items in accordance with Article 463(5) where:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">the institution was able to exercise a call with an incentive to redeem only prior to or on 20 July 2011;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p527 ft1">141</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_143">


<P class="p411 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the institution did not exercise the call on the date of the effective maturity of the items;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p39 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the conditions laid down in Article 60 are not met from the date of the effective maturity of the items.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p31 ft8">Article 469</P>
<P class="p344 ft8">Effective maturity</P>
<P class="p510 ft1">For the purposes of Articles 467 and 468, effective maturity shall be determined as follows:</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft31">for the items referred to in paragraphs 3and 5 of those Articles, it is the date of the first call with an incentive to redeem occurring on or after 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft134">for the items referred to in paragraph 4 of those Articles, it is the date of the first call with an incentive to redeem occurring between 20 July 2011 and 1 January 2013;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft31">for the items referred to in paragraph 6 of those Articles, it is the date of the first call with an incentive to redeem prior to 20 July 2011.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p42 ft7">Chapter 3</P>
<P class="p616 ft7">Transitional provisions for disclosure of own funds</P>
<P class="p44 ft8">Article 470</P>
<P class="p509 ft8">Disclosure of own funds</P>
<P class="p432 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Institutions shall apply during the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">During the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2015, institutions shall disclose the extent to which the level of Common Equity Tier 1 capital and Tier 1 capital exceed the requirements laid down in Article 448.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft4"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">During the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2017, institutions shall disclose the following additional information about their own funds:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p22 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the nature and effect on Common Equity Tier 1 capital, Additional Tier 1 capital, Tier 2 capital and own funds of the individual filters and deductions applied in accordance with Articles 449 to 452, 454, 456 and 459;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the amounts of minority interests and Additional Tier 1 and Tier 2 instruments, and related retained earnings and share premium accounts, issued by subsidiaries that are included in consolidated Common Equity Tier 1 capital, Additional Tier 1 capital, Tier 2 capital and own funds in accordance with Section 4 of Chapter 1;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the effect on Common Equity Tier 1 capital, Additional Tier 1 capital, Tier 2 capital and own funds of the individual filters and deductions applied in accordance with Article 461;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p617 ft1">142</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_144">


<P class="p37 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the nature and amount of items that qualify as Common Equity Tier 1 items, Tier 1 items and Tier 2 items by virtue of applying the derogations specified in Section 2 of Chapter 2.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p114 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">During the period from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2021, institutions shall disclose the amount of instruments that qualify as Common Equity Tier 1 instruments, Additional Tier 1 instruments and Tier 2 instruments by virtue of applying Article 463.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p618 ft7">Chapter 4</P>
<P class="p619 ft7">Large exposures, own funds requirements, leverage and the Basel I floor</P>
<P class="p14 ft8">Article 471</P>
<P class="p485 ft8">Transitional provisions for large exposures</P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">The provisions on large exposures as laid down in Articles 376 to 392 shall not apply to investment firms whose main business consists exclusively of the provision of investment services or activities in relation to the financial instruments set out in points 5, 6, 7, 9 and 10 of Section C of Annex I to Directive 2004/39/EC and to whom Directive 93/22/EEC did not apply on 31 December 2006. This exemption is available until 31 December 2014 or the date of entry into force of any amendments pursuant to paragraph 2, whichever is the earlier.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By 31 December 2014, the Commission shall, on the basis of public consultations and in the light of discussions with the competent authorities, report to the Parliament and the Council on:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p34 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">an appropriate regime for the prudential supervision of investment firms whose main business consists exclusively of the provision of investment services or activities in relation to the commodity derivatives or derivatives contracts set out in points 5, 6, 7, 9 and 10 of Section C of Annex I to Directive 2004/39/EC;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p35 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">the desirability of amending Directive 2004/39/EC to create a further category of investment firm whose main business consists exclusively of the provision of investment services or activities in relation to the financial instruments set out in points 5, 6, 7, 9 and 10 of Section C of Annex I to Directive 2004/39/EC relating to energy supplies.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p620 ft1">On the basis of this report, the Commission may submit proposals for amendments to this Regulation.</P>
<P class="p31 ft8">Article 472</P>
<P class="p621 ft8">Own funds requirements under the IRB approach</P>
<P class="p33 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By way of derogation from Chapter 3 of Part Three, until 31 December 2017, the competent authority may exempt from the IRB treatment certain categories of equity exposures held by institutions and EU subsidiaries of institutions in that Member State as at 31 December 2007. The competent authority shall publish the categories of equity exposures which benefit from this treatment in accordance with Article 133 of Directive [inserted by OP].</SPAN></P>
<P class="p622 ft1">143</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_145">


<P class="p148 ft1">The exempted position shall be measured as the number of shares as at 31 December 2007 and any additional share arising directly as a result of owning those holdings, provided they do not increase the proportional share of ownership in a portfolio company.</P>
<P class="p17 ft1">If an acquisition increases the proportional share of ownership in a specific holding the exceeding Part of the holding shall not be subject to the exemption. Nor shall the exemption apply to holdings that were originally subject to the exemption, but have been sold and then bought back.</P>
<P class="p152 ft1">Equity exposures subject to this provision shall be subject to the capital requirements calculated in accordance with the Standardised Approach under Part III, Title 2, Chapter II and the requirements set out in Title IV of Part Three, as applicable.</P>
<P class="p402 ft1">Competent authorities shall notify the Commission and EBA of the implementation of this paragraph.</P>
<P class="p217 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">In the calculation of risk weighted exposure amounts for the purposes of Article 109(4), until 31 December 2015 the same risk weight shall be assigned in relation to exposures to the central governments or central banks of Member States denominated and funded in the domestic currency of any Member State as would be applied to such exposures denominated and funded in their domestic currency.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">EBA shall develop draft regulatory technical standards to specify the conditions according to which Member States shall afford the exemption referred to in paragraph 1.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p24 ft1">EBA shall submit those draft regulatory technical standards to the Commission by 1 January 2013.</P>
<P class="p153 ft1">Power is delegated to the Commission to adopt the regulatory technical standards referred to in the first <NOBR>sub-paragraph</NOBR> in accordance with the procedure laid down in Articles 10 to 14 of Regulation (EU) No 1093/2010.</P>
<P class="p95 ft8">Article 473</P>
<P class="p196 ft8">Own funds requirements for covered bonds</P>
<P class="p16 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Until 31 December 2014, the 10 % limit for senior units issued by French Fonds Communs de Créances or by equivalent securitisation entities laid down in points (d) and (e) of Article 124(1) shall not apply, provided that:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p21 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft12">the securitised residential or commercial immovable property exposures were originated by a member of the same consolidated group of which the issuer of the covered bonds is also a member, or by an entity affiliated to the same central body to which the issuer of the covered bonds is also affiliated, where that common group membership or affiliation shall be determined at the time the senior units are made collateral for covered bonds;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p22 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">(b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">a member of the same consolidated group of which the issuer of the covered bonds is also a member, or an entity affiliated to the same central body to which the issuer of the covered bonds is also affiliated, retains the whole first loss tranche supporting those senior units.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p623 ft1">144</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_146">


<P class="p193 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">By 1 January 2013, the Commission shall review the appropriateness of the derogation set out in paragraph 1 and, if relevant, the appropriateness of extending similar treatment to any other form of covered bond. In the light of that review, the Commission may, if appropriate, adopt delegated acts in accordance with Article 445 to make that derogation permanent or make legislative proposals to extend it to other forms of covered bonds.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p119 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Until 31 December 2014, for the purposes of point (c) in Article 124(1), institutions' senior unsecured exposures which qualified for a 20% risk weight under national law before the entry into force of this regulation shall be considered to qualify for credit quality step 1.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p18 ft1"><SPAN class="ft1">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft9">Until 31 December 2014, for the purposes of Article 124(3), institutions' senior unsecured exposures to which qualified for a 20% risk weight under national law before the entry into force of this regulation shall be considered to qualify for a 20% risk weight.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p31 ft8">Article 474</P>
<P class="p96 ft8">Exemption for Commodities dealers</P>
